Ydrassil/BlackStorm/Baby:

Elita heard the smash and she wines scared and huged her daddy's, 
she didn't knew what was going on. Ydrassil cursed and moved to 
check Azure "AZure... Azure!!! Are you all right young one?????"

BlackStorm felt stunned by the pain  and she only could heard 
confuses noyses and voices around her, altough she notiec, too, that 
her arms and legs were tied and she couldn't move and defend herself



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Jeff" <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote:
> Gotcha covered Nic-san. Too bad I likely have nearly as much 
> homework. (3rd Year Computer Science Major in University) =)
> 
> -AzureBlade-
> 
> Azure nearly keeled over as the backlash from the abruptly severed 
> link smashed into his neuro-capacitors (i just made these up ;). 
His 
> arm shot out and caught the edge of the table before he collapsed 
> completely. As he caught himself he noticed something... something 
> that was off... something he'd just been in contact with. 
> 
> The dormant program.
> 
> It had latched itself to his neurolink just before it had been 
> severed. This was not only bad news, but it meant they still 
didn't 
> know how to remove it correctly.
> 
> Azure looked up at Ydrassil for a few moments with a pained 
> expression on his face before he cringed violently and slumped to 
> the ground quivering as the dormant - or perhaps not so dormant - 
> program showed him why a removal attempt was NOT in anyone's best 
> intrest.
>
